title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Anatomy of a Cloud Ransomware Attack: A Live Simulation (HMC206)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云勒索软件攻击剖析：实时模拟演示 (HMC206)
abstract: Your first experience with ransomware shouldn’t be when it’s happening to you. Join us for a unique, immersive simulation of a ransomware attack targeting a modern enterprise built on AWS. Part live performance, part real-world crisis reenactment, this session puts you in the middle of the action as the attack unfolds. See firsthand what it takes to respond and recover when your business is on the line. Leave with newfound confidence and a clear perspective on how to prepare for, respond to, and rapidly recover from a real-world cyberattack. This presentation is brought to you by Rubrik, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 您与勒索软件的第一次接触不应该是在它发生在您身上的时候。加入我们，体验针对构建在AWS上的现代企业的勒索软件攻击的独特沉浸式模拟。本次会议既是现场演示，也是真实世界危机的重现，让您置身于攻击展开的行动中心。亲眼见证当您的业务岌岌可危时，响应和恢复需要什么。带着新获得的信心和清晰的视角离开，了解如何准备、响应并快速从真实世界的网络攻击中恢复。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Rubrik为您呈现。

presenter.name: Caleb Tolin
presenter.title: Senior Manager, Global Social Media and Content Strategy
